rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports factual inclusion ('include six of the largest').
The segment does not contain a moderate verb paired with significant scale or impact.
This segment reports details of agreements without explicit calming language.
Segment does not contain a minimiser used with scale contrast.
The segment states agreements include manufacturers but contains no bare negation.
Describes agreements with manufacturers ('The agreements include six of the largest seasonal flu manufacturers') as a preparedness statement without active reassurance.
